net.ulrice.databinding.bufferedbinding.impl
Class BindingGroup

java.lang.Object
  net.ulrice.databinding.bufferedbinding.impl.AbstractBindingGroup
      net.ulrice.databinding.bufferedbinding.impl.BindingGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, IFAttributeModelEventListener, IFBindingGroup
public class BindingGroup
extends AbstractBindingGroup

A data group is a set of attribute model gui accessor pairs.

Author:
christof
